article_title: Leaked Apple Product Listings Suggest Refreshed iPad Pros Are Coming Soon
article_description: The iPad Pro hasn t gotten a major update since October of 2018  which means they re overdue for a refresh  And if a recent spate of product listings are any indication  there s a good chance that revamped iPad Pros could arrive quite soon  Read more
article_content: The iPad Pro hasnt gotten a major update since October of 2018  which means theyre overdue for a refresh  And if a recent spate of product listings are any indication  theres a good chance that revamped iPad Pros could arrive quite soon   Just yesterday  mul   1767 chars
